thread.title: Bat Bot is the biomimetic flying soft robot we deserve
thread.title_full: Bat Bot is the biomimetic flying soft robot we deserve

author: Pollyanna
title: Bat Bot is the biomimetic flying soft robot we deserve
text:
By Devin Coldewey 
If you’ve ever seen a bat in flight, you know how impressive their aerial acrobatics can be — so impressive that we have yet to successfully imitate it the way we have with locomotion or even bird flight. This impressive new flying robot is the best attempt yet, though it’s still a long way from the “unrivaled agility” of the real thing. Read More 
Read more here:: techcrunch.com – gadgets Rate this post
